column10:
1) Farming village has been attacked by rebels, survivors are questioned and killed
2) Mugen has been captured, Takuma is hiding
3) Yuki arrives in time to help Takuma
4) Together they rescue Mugen and the surviving farmers
5) Yuki is the driving force behind this mission. She motivates Takuma
6) Takuma is impressed by her simple sense of justice and eagerness to help
7) Takuma considers passing on his knowledge to her and wants to connect
Takuma is hiding from the rebels, who are on the search for him, when suddenly Yuki enters his hidingspot.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Suganuma Village
column12: 菅沼村

column10: Hmm, will death take me now? Perhaps it has been long enough ...
column12: 嗯…看来我气数已尽…… 这辈子也算活得够长了。

column10: Psst. Takuma-sama!
column12: 喂，琢磨师父！

column10: Ah! … Yuki-chan! … it's you child. Are you alone?
column12: 啊！……友希姑娘！怎么到这里来了，就你一个人吗？

column10: Yes. I followed Kuma here. The others couldn't come. What happened?
column12: 是的，小熊带我过来的。其他人来不了。这里发生了什么？

column10: Darkness and horror. The rebels slaughtered the farmers. Most of them are dead.
column12: 太惨无人道了。叛军血洗了村子，大部分人都死了。

column10: Mugen tried to help. Now he is a prisoner himself, being interrogated and, most likely, soon executed.
column12: 无限想去救他们，反而自身难保。敌人正在审问他，可能马上就要被处决。

column10: No. We'll save him …
column12: 怎么会…快去救他……

column10: It is impossible child. We are hardly a force to be reckoned with.
column12: 不可能的，孩子。敌我力量太过悬殊。

column10: We have to try! He's our friend! You don't leave friends behind!
column12: 不试试怎么知道！他是我们的同伴啊！怎么能见死不救！

column10: Such a young mind … very well, Yuki-chan. If we shall die, we might as well do so with purpose. Lead the way.
column12: 果然是年轻人……好吧，友希姑娘。就算死，也要死得其所。你来带路吧。

column10: A rebel has line up a group of farmers and shoots them one by one.
column12: A rebel has line up a group of farmers and shoots them one by one.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah!
column12: 啊！

column10: No …
column12: 不要啊……

column10: Demon! Monster! I curse you …
column12: 魔鬼！妖怪！你们不得好死……

column10: Takuma sets down Kuma. Yuki mentions how she met the tanuki.
column12: Takuma sets down Kuma. Yuki mentions how she met the tanuki.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Why did Kuma have blood on his fur?
column12: 小熊身上的血迹是怎么回事？

column10: A farmer died right next to him. I'm surprised you could get him to return here.
column12: 因为有个村民就在他面前被杀害。真没想到你有办法让他带你过来。

column10: It wasn't hard. I just made that sound you do.
column12: 很简单啊。我就试了试模仿你的发音方法。

column10: Hmm ... so you picked up on that …
column12: 嗯……你确实悟性过人……

column10: I bet Kuma wants to rescue master samurai too!
column12: 一定是因为小熊他也想救武士大哥！

column10: The team enters a field of rice. The high growing crops provide cover. However, rebels are searching the fields.
column12: The team enters a field of rice. The high growing crops provide cover. However, rebels are searching the fields.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah, the rice will provide cover.
column12: 喔，稻田正好可以做掩护。

column10: Rebels! … why are they searching the fields?
column12: 有叛军！……他们为什么要搜查稻田啊？

column10: Hmm, I'd say they are hunting for survivors.
column12: 喔，应该是在搜寻幸存者。

column10: Are the others … are they all dead? Mugen-sama …
column12: 其他人……都死了吗？武士大哥他……

column10: Stay calm, Yuki-chan! We must become the hunters and rescue Mugen.
column12: 冷静，友希姑娘！此刻更要沉着冷静才有可能救出无限。

column10: A rebel officer is ordering others to search the ricefields for hiding farmers.
column12: A rebel officer is ordering others to search the ricefields for hiding farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I saw a shadow. Find him!
column12: 我看到人影了，快搜！

column10: No one must escape! Lord Okkoto's orders.
column12: 乙事大人有令，不留活口！

column10: Someone's in there, I know it.
column12: 肯定还藏着人，我有感觉！

column10: Takuma uses his rifle to snipe an enemy.
column12: Takuma uses his rifle to snipe an enemy.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I do like your leg! It's quick and deadly, and it can hide, like my little trap.
column12: 你的木腿真好用！又快又狠，还能藏起来，和我的小陷阱一样。

column10: Hmm, what an unusual compliment. Do you know how I made it so quiet?
column12: 唔，你的赞美方式真是特别。你知道我是如何让枪消音的吗？

column10: No, don't tell! It's a good puzzle, but no time for puzzles now!
column12: 完全猜不到。这个问题很有意思，但现在没时间玩解谜。

column10: How right you are. Onward to Mugen.
column12: 你说得对。赶紧去救无限。

column10: A couple of rebel scouts leave the area for patrol.
column12: A couple of rebel scouts leave the area for patrol.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Let's search the fields further down the road to see if anyone's there.
column12: 再去那边的稻田里找找吧，看看有没有漏网之鱼。

column10: Yes, stay away …
column12: 好，走得越远越好……

column10: They will return eventually. We should not forget about them.
column12: 他们还会绕回来的，切记。

column10: A farming woman tries to escape from a house. A rebel shoots her.
column12: A farming woman tries to escape from a house. A rebel shoots her.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: No! Please no! Help me! Help!
column12: 不！求你了，不要！救命啊！

column10: No! Please no! Help me! Help!
column12: 不！求...求你了，不要！救命啊！

column9: rebel comes out the door and shoots escapee

column10: Teh … serves you right.
column12: 嘁……你自找的。

column10: Right after the rebels shot the helpless farming woman
column12: Right after the rebels shot the helpless farming woman

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: They didn't have to shoot him.
column12: 为什么要乱杀无辜。

column10: They didn't have to shoot her.
column12: 为什么要乱杀无辜。

column10: These men are beasts. They'll do whatever they want, with or without reason.
column12: 这帮人都是畜生。他们肆无忌惮，杀人不需要理由。

column10: I hope Mugen-sama is OK.
column12: 希望武士大哥平安无恙。

column10: Yuki-chan. Do not worry, we will save him.
column12: 友希姑娘，别担心，一定能救到他的。

column10: The team discovers a pile of executed farmers.
column12: The team discovers a pile of executed farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Such shame.
column12: 死得太冤了。

column10: Why did they have to die? They didn't hurt anyone.
column12: 为什么要杀这些村民？他们又没有伤害别人。

column10: To make a point. These farmers died because they remained loyal to the Shogun.
column12: 杀一儆百。他们想让世人记住效忠将军的下场。

column10: Please don't die, master samurai.
column12: 千万不要死啊，武士大哥。

column10: He is strong Yuki-chan. We will reach him in time.
column12: 他很坚强的，友希姑娘。我们一定能及时赶到。

column10: All the more reason to help those who survived.
column12: 所以一定要去救幸存的人。

column10: Two rebels keep knocking on a door an demanding entrance.
column12: Two rebels keep knocking on a door an demanding entrance.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Open up!
column12: 开门！

column10: Open the door!
column12: 快开门！

column10: We'll get in eventually!
column12: 不要做无谓抵抗！

column10: It won't hold forever!
column12: 门是挡不住我们的！

column10: Open it! Now!
column12: 开门，赶紧的！

column10: Two rebels break down a door and storm inside a house. You hears screaming from the inside.
column12: Two rebels break down a door and storm inside a house. You hears screaming from the inside.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ha!
column12: 哈哈！

column10: Please! Leave us alone …
column12: 求求你们！放过我们吧……

column10: The team witnesses rebels who force their way into a house. You hear screaming from inside.
column12: The team witnesses rebels who force their way into a house. You hear screaming from inside.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Vile beasts.
column12: 卑鄙畜生。

column10: Just like Okaa-san ...
column12: 和“妈妈”一样……

column10: Yuki-chan?
column12: 友希姑娘?

column10: Nothing. Mugen-sama needs us.
column12: 没什么，快去救无限大哥。

column10: The team sees looters putting bags and crates on wagons.
column12: The team sees looters putting bags and crates on wagons.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hmm, looters.
column12: 嗯，都是搜刮来的赃物。

column10: Maybe Mugen-sama's weapons are here somewhere.
column12: 无限大哥的装备也许就放在这里。

column10: Heh, good thinking.
column12: 嗯，应该没错。

column10: Yuki and Takuma approach the area where Mugen is held captive and questioned by a samurai.
column12: Yuki and Takuma approach the area where Mugen is held captive and questioned by a samurai.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: There's Mugen-sama!
column12: 无限大哥在那儿!

column10: He is well guarded. We must take on his interrogator together, yes?
column12: 敌人看守得很严。我们要合力才能干掉那个审讯他的武士，知道吗？

column10: Hai! You shoot, I finish him!
column12: 明白！你先开枪，我再杀他！

column10: Yuki-chan, why are you so eager to risk your life for Mugen?
column12: 友希姑娘，为何你愿为了无限如此奋不顾身？

column9: Mugen is the only kind/accepting samurai she met
column10: I told you, he's a friend. And a GOOD samurai.
column12: 我说过了，他是我的同伴，而且人非常好。

column10: A samurai interrogates Mugen
column12: A samurai interrogates Mugen

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: How did you know we were coming?
column12: 你是怎么知道我们的行踪的？

column10: Were you alone? Or are other Shogunate dogs hiding in the fields?
column12: 就你一个人？是不是还有幕府的狗腿子藏在稻田地里？

column10: Your resistance will earn you nothing!
column12: 反抗对你没有好处！

column10: What does the Shogun's brother know of our plans?
column12: 将军的兄弟对我们的计划知道多少？

column10: Speak, and I will grant you an honourable death.
column12: 要是从实招来，我可以让你死得体面点。

column10: Did you really think you could stand against Lord Okkoto?
column12: 你还真以为能挡得住乙事大人？

column10: You will talk soon enough when we boil you alive.
column12: 非得把你扔到开水里煮，才肯开口吗。

column10: Yuki and Takuma free Mugen from his shackles.
column12: Yuki and Takuma free Mugen from his shackles.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Yuki-chan. What are you doing here?!
column12: ...友希小妹，你怎么来了？

column10: akuma-san. You returned for me?
column12: ...琢磨大师。你回来救我了？

column10: Yuki-chan has saved us both, Mugen. We are in her debt.
column12: 多亏友希姑娘救了我们，无限。都是她的功劳。

column10: My dear Yuki-chan! I owe you my life! By my honour, I will not forget this!
column12: 喔哦，友希小妹。你对我的救命之恩，这辈子我都不会忘记的。

column10: Thank you, master samurai!
Now, we must find the surviving farmers and give them the same curtesy as you gave me.
column12: 现在，一起去找幸存的村民，把他们也都救出来吧。

column9: doesn't like being praised so much
column10: Uhm, Mugen-sama … they took your armour …
column12: 那个…武士大哥，你的装备怎么办……

column10: Ah, yes, we must find my equipment first. Let us make haste!
column12: 啊，对，得先找到我的装备才行。那就赶紧去找吧！

column10: Yuki or Takuma find Mugen's gear.
column12: Yuki or Takuma find Mugen's gear.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah, samurai gear, but no samurai to carry it.
column12: 啊，是武士装备，但武士本人却不在。

column10: Ergh … so heavy. It wants to be with Mugen-sama.
column12: 呃……太重了。看来只有无限大哥本人才请得动。

column10: I will be there soon.
column12: 我这就过来。

column10: Mugen picks up his gear and now wants to free the farmers.
column12: Mugen picks up his gear and now wants to free the farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah, alive again! Now, we must ascend to the main farm! The survivors must be there.
column12: 啊，可算找回来了！接下来赶紧去上面的农场吧！幸存者一定在那。

column10: Are there any left?
column12: 还会有幸存者吗？

column10: If we make haste.
column12: 赶紧过去的话，还有一线希望。

column10: On the way to the farmers.
column12: On the way to the farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Are Aiko-san and Hayato-san nearby?
column12: 爱子小姐和隼人兄也在这附近吗？

column9: afraid Mugen will kick her out
column10: No. They're following that general. I, uh … had a message for Lord Noboru. But then I met Kuma, and … am I in trouble?
column12: 不，他们在跟踪那个大将…...啊……我手头还有个情报要交给昇大人。但半路遇到了小熊，然后就……这下怎么办啊？

column10: Do not worry, Yuki-chan. You saved our lives, so the responsibility is mine. We will deliver your message together.
column12: 别担心，友希小妹。你也是为了救我们才过来的，所以在下也要担责。等会儿我们一起去送情报吧。

column10: Hai, Mugen-sama!
column12: 好的，武士大哥！

column10: The team discoveres the captured farmers.
column12: The team discoveres the captured farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Men and woman, penned together like cattle.
column12: 有男有女，像牲口一样被关在那里。

column10: I see them ... at the stables and in the backyard.
column12: 我看见他们了……在牛棚和后院里。

column10: We must free them. I will speak to them after we have slain the rebels.
column12: 想办法解救这些村民。得先把叛军守卫都干掉，我再去跟他们说明情况。

column10: A group of farmers is penned in at the stables. (loop)
column12: A group of farmers is penned in at the stables. (loop)

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: This is bad … maybe we …
column12: 好残忍……我们完了……

column10: Dark times dark times.
column12: 好可怕，好可怕…

column10: They are going to kill us!
column12: 要来杀我们了！

column10: Husband ... be safe …
column12: 夫君……你一定要平安无事啊……

column10: We should have surrendered.
column12: 应该早点投降就好了。

column10: We must not  give in to fear. Someone will come.
column12: 不能向恐惧低头。会有人来救我们的。

column10: The team frees the farmers.
column12: The team frees the farmers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Thank you. We knew the Shogun would send help!
column12: 太感谢了！我们就知道将军会派人来救我们的！

column10: My husband! They took him away ...
column12: 我丈夫！他们把他带走了……

column10: He will live, you have my word. Now, follow our lead.
column12: 他不会死的，我向你保证。现在请跟我们走。

column10: He is already with us. Stay close and we will escape together.
column12: 他已经和我们在一起了。跟紧点，我们一起逃出去。

column10: We will follow you.
column12: 我们会跟着您的。

column10: A samurai interrogates a farmer in the backyard.
column12: A samurai interrogates a farmer in the backyard.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Who is the samurai that came to your aid?
column12: 来帮你的武士是谁？

column10: I don't know who he is.
column12: 我不知道他是谁。

column10: Don't lie to me, peasant.
column12: 贱民，可不准骗我。

column10: I only know the Shogun will send more like him. They will kill you.
column12: 我只知道将军会派更多武士过来，到时候你就死定了。

column10: Your defiance means nothing. We will make you talk.
column12: 哈哈，嘴上挑衅有什么用。我们有的是办法让你开口。

column10: The team frees the head farmer.
column12: The team frees the head farmer.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Thank you, my lord. Please! Others are at the stables. My wife too…
column12: 谢谢您，大人。但牛棚里也关了人。我妻子，也在那……

column10: We will free them. Now, you must do as I tell you.
column12: 我们会去救他们的。不过你得听我指挥。

column10: They have been freed. Now, come with us and we will escape together.
column12: 他们已经救出来了。来和我们一起逃出去吧。

column10: I will follow your lead.
column12: 我会跟着您的。

column10:
The prison patrol discovers that someone has escaped.
(also used this for when Mugen's escape is discovered)
column12: The prison patrol discovers that someone has escaped.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Someone escaped! Search the area!
column12: 有人逃跑啦！都给我搜！

column10: Someone got free! Search the area!
column12: 有人逃跑啦！都给我搜！

column10: During the escape, halfway out the level.
column12: During the escape, halfway out the level.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: We can never repay you for this kindness.
column12: 您的大恩大德，我们要怎么报答？

column10: We have not made it to safety yet.
column12: 还没到安全的地方，别掉以轻心。

column10: We would be dead already if not for you.
column12: 要是没有你，我们早没命了。

column10: Then spread the word, the Shogun does not abandon his people.
column12: 那就替我放个话吧，告诉天下百姓，将军没有抛弃他的人民。

column10: A couple of rebel scouts enter the farm and block the exit.
column12: A couple of rebel scouts enter the farm and block the exit.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: We're back! Looks like … wait, something's wrong here!  Everyone! Block the road!
column12: 我们回来了！…...等等，情况不对！全员注意，封锁道路！

column10: Scouts, returning from patrol. Everyone, keep your distance!
column12: 是侦察队，他们刚巡逻回来。大家注意，别靠他们太近！

column10: Hmm, I told you they'd come back. He, I feel a sudden itch in my leg.
column12: 嗯，我说过他们会回来的吧。嘿嘿，突然觉得腿有点痒。

column10: We're almost out! So close!
column12: 马上就逃出去了，还差一点！

column10: At the exit of the level.
column12: At the exit of the level.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Is everyone alright?
column12: 所有人都还好吧？

column10: Yes. Thank you, my lord, thank you.
column12: 是的。谢谢您，武士大人，万分感谢！

column10: We must all thank this brave young woman here. Her name is Yuki, and without her, none of us would be alive.
column12: 大家听好，我们都得感谢这位勇敢的姑娘。她的名字是友希，如果没有她，我们早已命丧黄泉。

column10: N-no, that's not …
column12: 哎？不 ，我没有……

column10: We owe you everything, Yuki-chan. I pray that we can return this kindness one day.
column12: 多亏有您在，友希小姐。日后一定回报您的救命之恩。

column10: I … ah … you're welcome.
column12: 啊……我……不敢当。

column10: Now, we should leave, before more rebels arrive.
column12: 那大家赶紧离开此地吧，否则叛军的人又要来了。

column10: Where will you take us?
column12: 您要带我们去哪？

column10: We will head for Lord Noboru's camp. You will find shelter there until this matter is resolved.
column12: 我们将前往昇大人的军营。在叛军清缴完之前，你们可在那里避难。

column10: Well done Yuki-chan.
column12: 嘿嘿嘿，干得漂亮，友希姑娘。

column10: Thank you, Takuma-sama!
column12: 谢谢，琢磨大师！

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
